pageContext.claim: “Frankly, the Republicans were gentlemen and women. When we had the majority in the House, they didn't do subpoenas all day long. They didn't do what they — what these people have done.”
pageContext.analysis: House Republicans were like lambs during the first two years of Trump's term but they issued a blizzard of subpoenas when they controlled the House and Barack Obama, a Democrat was in the White House.
